nodes.text: Portrait of a Twi'lek Female was a painting made sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It depicted a teal Female Twi'lek with purple eyeshadow, and came in eight frames: A large plain gold frame; a large ornate gold frame; a large plain silver frame; a large ornate silver frame; a medium plain gold frame; a medium plain silver frame; a small ornate gold frame; and a small ornate silver frame.
The portrait of a Twi'lek female was planned to be used for the Jabba's Theme Park area in Star Wars Galaxy.
